metadata.title: CVE-2018-10888 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libgit2 before version 0.27.3. A missing check ingit_delta_apply function in delta.c file, may lead to an out-of-bound readwhile reading a binary delta file. An attacker may use this flaw to cause aDenial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-24 - 0.24.1-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.1-2ubuntu0.2').
